summary.span: 封裝沒有參數且沒有傳回值的方法。

span.span: Encapsulates a method that has no parameters and does not return a value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此委派要做為參數傳遞給方法，而不必明確宣告自訂委派。You can use this delegate to pass a method as a parameter without explicitly declaring a custom delegate. 封裝的方法必須對應至這個委派所定義的方法簽章。The encapsulated method must correspond to the method signature that is defined by this delegate. 這表示封裝的方法必須沒有參數且沒有傳回值。This means that the encapsulated method must have no parameters and no return value. (在 C# 中，此方法必須傳回`void`。(In C#, the method must return `void`. 在 Visual Basic 中，它必須定義的`Sub`...`End Sub`In Visual Basic, it must be defined by the `Sub`…`End Sub` 建構。construct. 它也可以傳回值，則會忽略這個值的方法。）通常，這種方法用來執行作業。It can also be a method that returns a value that is ignored.)
